      • get

        public Rate get(String baseCurrency,
                String currency)
         throws RateQueryException
        Retrieve the rates for a cryptocurrency / fiat pair. See https://bitpay.com/bitcoin-exchange-rates.
        Parameters:
        baseCurrency - the cryptocurrency for which you want to fetch the rates. Current supported values are BTC and BCH.
        currency - the fiat currency for which you want to fetch the baseCurrency rates.
        Returns:
        A Rates object populated with the BitPay exchange rate table.
        Throws:
        RateQueryException - RateQueryException class
        Since:
        8.8.0

      • getRates

        public Rates getRates()
               throws RateQueryException
        Retrieve the exchange rate table maintained by BitPay. See https://bitpay.com/bitcoin-exchange-rates.
        Returns:
        A Rates object populated with the BitPay exchange rate table.
        Throws:
        RateQueryException - RateQueryException class

      • getRates

        public Rates getRates(String baseCurrency)
               throws RateQueryException
        Retrieve the exchange rate table maintained by BitPay by baseCurrency. See https://bitpay.com/bitcoin-exchange-rates.
        Parameters:
        baseCurrency - the cryptocurrency for which you want to fetch the rates. Current supported values are BTC and BCH.
        Returns:
        A Rates object populated with the BitPay exchange rate table.
        Throws:
        RateQueryException - RateQueryException class
        Since:
        8.8.0
